title: Sausage and tomato casserole
ingredients: ['2 large onions, chopped', '28g (1oz) plain flour or cornflour', '800g (1 3/4lb) tomatoes', '2 green peppers, seeded and chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 bay leaf', '680g (1 1/2lb) pork sausages', '2 tablespoons brown breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese']
